group_1.textLeft: Thanks for joining me. @I’m sorry about this...

group_1.textRight: Don’t worry about it.
...Still, I can’t believe you need to wear a Santa @outfit when it’s not even the proper season for it.
Alina is pretty obnoxious...

group_1.textLeft: Yes... Apparently, this is for one of her drawings.

group_1.textRight: But… Why a Santa outfit?
Surely there must be some other ideas she can @draw instead.

group_1.textLeft: I can't be sure what’s going through Alina’s head, @but it may have to do with the colors.

group_1.textRight: Well, it does seem like she prefers red and green...

group_1.textLeft: In any case, this costume rental shop has been @very accommodating!
[chara:100601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]And considering you're a model, I feel very @reassured that you're helping me out.

group_1.textRight: There are more kinds of Christmas outfits than I thought.

group_1.textLeft: You’re right… @It’s hard to decide what to wear.

group_1.textRight: Did Alina give you any guidelines?

group_1.textLeft: No… Just that it had to be a Christmas outfit.

group_1.textRight: Well, then… [chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]What type of outfit do you think would @be appropriate?

group_1.textLeft: I’d like something that seems calm… @And safe.

group_1.textRight: Something safe… @How about this?

group_1.textLeft: Alright, I’ll try that on for a bit!

group_1.narration: “Yes, what do you think? @I think something like this @would work, but…”

group_1.textCenter: I think it’s a bit... TOO safe.
I think we should strive to pick something that only @you could pull off.

group_1.narration: “This one has a long skirt! @What do you think?”

group_1.textCenter: I don't know. It's not bad, it's nice, actually, but it @just doesn't seem like the right choice.

And I think Alina would get angry at how it covers @up your body, so… [chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:100201:motion_400][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]Next.

group_1.narration: "A Santa-themed bunny @outfit with a miniskirt... @Th-the way it's showing off my breasts and legs is...@ I-it's completely shameless! @[bgEffect:shakeSmall]I-I’ll never be able to get married @if I dress up like this!”

group_1.textCenter: Oh, that’s surprising. @You usually dress like that...
I just assumed you liked that sort of thing...

group_1.narration: "What kind of woman do @you take me for, Yacchan?!"[bgEffect:shakeLarge]

group_1.textCenter: ...Anyway, let’s move on to the next one. @I think this should look good.

group_1.narration: “A frilly Lolita-style @Santa costume with a miniskirt... @Erm, doesn't this seem @like a bit...much...?
“You laughed just now, didn’t you? @Are you treating this like some kind of game?! @Please don’t joke around @with such a stoic look on your face! @I can’t tell if you’re being serious or not!”

group_1.textCenter: I’m not joking. I’m being quite serious.

group_1.narration: “If you play around like that again, @I’ll be very angry at you.”

group_1.textCenter: ...What you said earlier makes sense now.
What do you think of this, Mifuyu?

group_1.textRight: It is, isn’t it?
The Lolita-style miniskirt and the bunny outfits @were still cute, though.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh! Please stop teasing me like that!

group_1.textRight: I wasn’t teasing.

group_1.narration: "If you wear something @too conservative, @you won't be able to make the most of your figure. @Plus, you look more fashionable @in a miniskirt than a long one."
"Though the bunny outfit is worn @for a different purpose, @the headband really complements your short hair. @And an elegant style suits you @better than the Lolita ones."

group_1.textLeft: I had no idea you were thinking on that level...
You really are a pro, Yacchan...!

group_1.textRight: (I was teasing her just a bit back then, but… @I'll keep that a secret.)

group_1.textLeft: Okay, I’ll take this one!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I think that’ll work.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100651:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eep! Wh-what was that sound?!

group_1.textRight: I thought it came from behind you, but...
.........[wait:0.8][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]Ah.

group_1.textLeft: What is it, Yacchan?!

group_1.textRight: The... clasp on your back popped open.

group_1.textLeft: Ehh?!
N-no way… @Have I really gained that much weight?!
Ugh... Alina will scold me again...

group_1.textRight: (It’s not that you gained weight, it’s…)
You’ve got what they call the “perfect body,” @after all.

group_1.textLeft: Are you being sarcastic?!

group_1.textRight: If anything, you were the one being sarcastic.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* Alright, I’ll go buy this.

group_1.textRight: Sounds good.

group_1.textLeft: But... I think this will be a worthy purchase.
Thank you very much, Yacchan.

group_1.textRight: You’re welcome, Mifuyu.
And... You look great in that dress.

group_1.textLeft: Next time, let me pick out some outfits for you!

group_1.textRight: ............@[wait:0.8][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:motion_200][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_014.exp.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]Well, maybe someday.
